Settings.Sound_Hint: The sound that is played when a Log In/Out message is displayed to the chat
Settings.GmOnly_Hint: Only show the user login/logout messages to the GM.
Settings.NotMe_Name: Don't show my own to me
Settings.NotMe_Hint: Only show your login/logout messages to others, and not to yourself.
Settings.Delay_Hint: How many seconds should a login/logout message be kept in the log?
Settings.SelfDestruct_Hint: Messages will automatically delete themselves from the chat log after defined amount of time.

Confirm.Title: Reset All Messages
Confirm.Content: Are you sure you wish to reset all of the messages to the default ones? This cannot be undone, and will delete any custom messages.
